title: Fallback title for the infobox and the browser tab title, this should always be replaced by the title of the actual map through the i18n_override configuration
description: Fallback description for the infobox, this should always be replaced by the title of the actual map through the i18n_override configuration

info_box.open_popup: Alt text for the '‚ÑπÔ∏è' button to open the info popup
info_box.click_anywhere: Click anywhere on the map to explore.
info_box.use_controls: Instructions to use the controls on the sides to see other data
info_box.to_see_statistics: Instructions to use the button to see statistics about elements
info_box.to_choose_source: Instructions to use the button to choose which data source to use
info_box.to_overpass_query: Instructions to use the button to view the source OverpassQL query
info_box.to_wikidata_query: Instructions to use the button to view the source SPARQL query
info_box.to_view_data_table: Instructions to use the button to open a table with the map features
info_box.to_change_background: Instructions to use the button to change the background map style
info_box.to_open_again: Instructions to use the button to open again the info popup
info_box.contribute: Text of the button that links to the documentation to contribute to the map
info_box.download_dataset: Text of the button to download the data as dataset
info_box.last_db_update: Text before the date of the last database update
info_box.based_on: Text before the link to the OSM-Wikidata Map Framework repository
info_box.report_issue: Text of the link to the issue tracker
info_box.report_issue_title: Alt text of the link to the issue tracker
info_box.about_me: Text of the About me button
info_box.about_me_title: Alt text of the About me button

snackbar.zoom_in: Instructions to zoom in to view data
snackbar.fetch_error: Error message shown when an error occurred while fetching the data
snackbar.map_error: Error message shown when an internal error occurred
snackbar.data_loaded: Success message shown when the data has been successfully fetched and loaded
snackbar.no_data_in_this_area: Warning message when the viewport is intentionally wmpty because it contains no data
snackbar.data_loaded_instructions: Instructions shown after the first load to click on any highlighted element to show its details

source.choose_source: Alt text for the '‚öôÔ∏è' button to show/hide the source dropdown
source.db_osm_wikidata_reverse: Wikidata entities referenced with OSM wikidata=* and {{indirectWdProperty}}
source.wd_indirect: P625 qualifiers on {{indirectWdProperty}} and Wikidata entities referenced with {{indirectWdProperty}}

color_scheme.choose_scheme: Alt text for the 'üìä' button to show/hide the color scheme / stats dropdown
color_scheme.blue: Dropdown item for uniform blue color
color_scheme.feature_source: Dropdown item for map feature source statistics
color_scheme.gender: Dropdown item for linked entity gender statistics
color_scheme.type: Dropdown item for linked entity type statistics
color_scheme.country: Dropdown item for linked entity country statistics
color_scheme.occupation: Dropdown item for linked entity occupation statistics
color_scheme.start_century: Dropdown item for linked entity start/birth century statistics
color_scheme.end_century: Dropdown item for linked entity end/death century statistics
color_scheme.link_count: Dropdown item for linked entity Wikilink count statistics
color_scheme.feature_picture: Dropdown item for feature picture availability statistics
color_scheme.osm_text_only: Features with only text etymology (no linked entities)
color_scheme.etymology_statistics: Dropdown category for linked entity statistics
color_scheme.black: Dropdown item for uniform black color
color_scheme.red: Dropdown item for uniform red color
color_scheme.orange: Dropdown item for uniform orange color
color_scheme.etymology_source: Dropdown item for linked entity source statistics

feature_details.loading_first_n_items: Warning message shown when a feature contains more etymologies than the max configured limit, should contain the variables {{partial}} (number of shown etymologies) and {{total}} (total etymologies)
feature_details.location: Alt text of the 'üéØ' button to move the map to the location of the feature/etymology
feature_details.picture_via_commons: Attribution to Wikimedia Commons under the images
feature_details.loading: Placeholder text shown while fetching and loading the etymologies
feature_details.report_problem: Text of the button that links to the documentations for reporting/fixing errors

etymology_details.propagation_title: Alt text of the link to the description of the propagation mechanism

data_table.view_data_table: View the data in a table

change_language: Alt text for the language selection control
choose_basemap: Alt text for the 'üåç' button to show/hide the style dropdown
choose_projection: Alt text for the 'üåê' button to show/hide the projection dropdown
overpass_turbo_query: Alt text for the button that links to the source OverpassQL query on Overpass Turbo
wdqs_query: Alt text for the button that links to the source SPARQL query on Wikidata Query Service
qlever_query: Alt text for the button that links to the source SPARQL query on QLever
clear_cache: Alt text for the 'üóëÔ∏è' button to clear the IndexedDB map/details/stats cache
